title: Question about Wit's End and the Current Abyssal Scepter.
body: **Scenario:** If I have both items and I'm attacking a target with 25 mr. Is the MR steal from {{item:3091}} calculated after the MR reduction of {{item:3001}} dissallowing me to take their mr below zero or does the steal go off the full 5 hits, taking them from 5 (due to reduc.) to 0/-5/-10/-15/-20 respectfully as if the Abyssal Scepter is feeding the Wit's End the mr it reduced and instead reduces the mr below 0 perodically because of the 2 interactions.

replies.body: I found this quote from 2010 from a senior member on the boards...so im not 100% sure if it still rings true today. I would have to imagine it does though.    "Resistances can only be dropped below 0 by reduction, not penetration. The problem is, reduction is applied before any penetration, so it is very difficult to reduce anyone's resistance below 0."

> [{quoted}](name=LastBreathX,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=OYB5xlXc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-01T13:36:59.601+0000)
>
> I found this quote from 2010 from a senior member on the boards...so im not 100% sure if it still rings true today. I would have to imagine it does though.    "Resistances can only be dropped below 0 by reduction, not penetration. The problem is, reduction is applied before any penetration, so it is very difficult to reduce anyone's resistance below 0."

I know this... But I never considered Wit's End's steal as penetration also I thought that since the steal is on hit, the Aura of Abys would re-evaluate itself after every steal finally reaching the -20mr :/
